virtual BOOLEAN OnKeyDown (KeyCode key_code)

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for all singleline editors. Derived classes only have to provide a document by overwriting Component::CreateModel.

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

INT AbstractLineEditor::GetFirstVisibleIndex (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the first visible index of the editor. The first visible index indicates the index of the item which is visible on the upper left of the editor.

INT AbstractLineEditor::GetVisibleItemCount (   )  const
 

Returns:
Number of visible items in a line (a clipped item at the right border is counted too).

void AbstractLineEditor::SetFirstVisibleIndex (  INT  index  ) 
 

Sets the first visible index of the editor to index. The first visible index indicates the index of the item which is visible on the upper left of the editor.

BOOLEAN AbstractLineEditor::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from AbstractEditor.

Reimplemented in DateEditor, IpAddrEditor, LineEditor, PasswordEditor, and TimeEditor.
